ygData.subject: Re: Re: faq
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes.  The Gypsy Lute (not the Princess Lute) gives +5 magic resistance.  I know this since I was looking at it just before making my Lambent BP, and
ygData.messageBody:
Jason Rochelle wrote:

> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
>
> > The Lute of the Gypsy Princess (also found in Mistmoore) which has no
> > discernible special effect.
> > The Gypsy Lute (different from the Lute of the Gypsy Princess, in
> > that it is for a specific quest), which has no known special abilities.
>
> Does not ones of these give +5 magic resistance? I know that's not much
> of an "ability" but it is SOMETHING.
>

Yes. The Gypsy Lute (not the Princess Lute) gives +5 magic resistance. I know this since I was looking
at it just before making my Lambent BP, and thinking that I was going to have to get another one.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk
